subject: feat(charts): auto-resize iframe containers via postMessage protocol
body:
Chart iframes now dynamically size to their content height using
repo-tor's new repo-tor:resize postMessage protocol instead of fixed
Tailwind height classes. Adds useIframeAutoResize hook that validates
message origin, matches event.source to the correct iframe ref, and
falls back to static heights until the first message arrives.
